author: bayard
msg: Removed unnecessary private toArray method. It was only invoked from one location. LANG-491

author: bayard
msg: Removed the ability to modify the static store of cause method names. If that feature is wanted, it's easy for the user to pass in their own list, or use the newly added getDefaultCauseMethodNames and modify that before calling. This removes the need for synchronization code. LANG-491

author: bayard
msg: Removing now unnecessary static initializer block. LANG-491

author: bayard
msg: Removing setCause method. JDK 1.4 provided an initCause method and this method was to support both pre and post JDK 1.4 use cases. I don't see much of a reason to keep supporting Exceptions that have setCause as well as the inherited initCause. LANG-491
